srm_base_reg

Base class for the register.

Do not directly instantiate this class.  It is used by the framework to deal with template registers in a generic way.

Summary
srm_base_reg
Base class for the register.
Class Hierarchy
srm_component
srm_base_reg

Initialization

new

function new( string  name,
srm_component  parent )

add_field

function void add_field( srm_base_field  f )

Add a field to the register.

A register maintains a collection of fields.  The fields need not be sorted in any particular order.

set_policy

virtual function void set_policy( string  addr_map_name,
srm_base_field_policy  policy )

Sets the policy on all the fields of the register .

This is a helper function.  It is also possible to set different policy on each field by setting it directly on the field.

Introspection

get_width_bytes

virtual function int get_width_bytes()

Returns the width of the register in bytes

Add up the number of bits in each field.  The register by definition need to be byte aligned.  Hence the user must add reserved fields to ensure that this is always true.

get_size

virtual function srm_addr_t get_size( string  addr_map_name )

FIXME: Return the number of bytes in address map.  SHould it not be the same for all address maps since the field is the same ?

addr_map_name FIXME: May not be required.  For a register it is the width of the register.  The value is cached for performance reason.

get_num_fields

virtual function int get_num_fields()

Return the number of fields in the entry.

Reset

set_reset_kind

virtual function void set_reset_kind( string  kind )

Set the type of reset supported on the register.

The spec needs to ensure same kind supported by all the fields in the register.

is_resettable

virtual function bit is_resettable( string  kind )

Return true if the register supports this kind of reset.

kind is the type of reset.

reset

virtual function void reset( string  kind )

Reset all the fields of the register.

kind is the type of reset.  This has no effect on the register if the register does not support that kind of reset.

Access Model Only

get_bytes

virtual function srm_data_t get_bytes()

Return the value of the register model as a list of bytes.

Get the value from the constituent fields and merge them together.  This is used by the framework to treat registers in a generic fashion.

set_bytes

virtual function void set_bytes( const ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Set the value in the register model to the list of bytes.

bytes are the list of bytes that are to be written to the model.  Extract the field values from the list of bytes and set them.

Access Model+Design

load

virtual task load( srm_base_handle  handle )

Load the design data into the model.

handle Options required for the read.  Read the data from the design and silently update the model.  No checking is done for non volatile fields.

store

virtual task store( srm_base_handle  handle )

Store the model data into the design.

handle Options required for the write.  Writes the data from the model to the design.  All the byte enables are turned on for this write.

Functional Coverage

attach

virtual function void attach( srm_base_coverage  observer )

Attach an observer to itself.

observer is the coverage observer attached to the register.

detach

virtual function void detach( srm_base_coverage  observer )

Detach an observer if it exists.

observer is the instance to be detached.

detach_all

virtual function void detach_all()

Detach all observers

Remove all the observers from the node.

post_write

virtual function void post_write()

Post write functional callback.

Calls post_write on all the callback clients after the write task completes.  Both the design and model have been updated before this gets invoked.

post_read

virtual function void post_read()

Post read functional coverage.

Calls post_read on all the callback clients after the read task completes.  The model has already been updated with the read data before this is invoked.

sample_xact

virtual function void sample_xact( const ref  srm_generic_xact_t  generic_xact )

Generate xact functional covearage.  FIXME: What is the use case ?

Private API

__initialize

protected function void __initialize( srm_base_reg  obj )

Private function to create the clone.

get_index

virtual function srm_addr_t get_index()

This is for callback to access the index of the array entry.

__write_bytes

virtual task __write_bytes( srm_base_handle  handle,
const ref  srm_data_t  bytes,
const ref  srm_byte_enable_t  byte_enables )

Send the bus xact to the adapter class.

For use by framework classes only.

__read_bytes

virtual task __read_bytes( srm_base_handle  handle,   
ref  srm_data_t  bytes,   
const ref  srm_byte_enable_t  byte_enables,   
input  bit  skip_check  =  )

Read the data from the register.

Checks that the read data matches the model value.  Will report error for non volatile fields.  Volatile fields are silently updated.

class srm_component
A node in the design tree hierarchy.
